attributes.additional_details:
My e-patition is to introduce the death penalty for cop killers. The police are here to protect us all and we should give them our full support.

They are fighting in the front line of crime to ensure we can all sleep sound in our beds at night. Anybody who feels they can take a life of a police officer in the line of duty should face the ultimate price….The Death Penalty.

PS, I am not a policeman…
